body_html: I expected you would be interested in this. It's going to take some more time, probably a few weeks, in order to get all of the pieces checked in (it's a large amount of new code, altogether). At that point I'd be happy to discuss with you how to extend the GDR runtime to support collective ops. The design goal is very much to allow for high-performance extensions since it's impossible to offer one implementation that is optimal for all circumstances. Towards that end it will be very useful to have feedback from users adapting TF to different platforms.
